articles.author: GERALD IMRAY
articles.title: Trump says some white South Africans are oppressed and could be resettled in the US. They say no thanks - The Associated Press
articles.description: Groups representing some of South Africa’s white minority have responded to a plan by U.S. President Donald Trump to offer them refugee status and resettlement in the United States by saying: thanks, but no thanks. The plan was detailed in an executive order …
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) Groups representing some of South Africas white minority responded Saturday to a plan by President Donald Trump to offer them refugee status and resettlement in the Unite… [+5005 chars]
